marklogic.body:
Dear Franky,
I found an error in your comment. I will correct it for you.
Error:Steroids have the potential to harm a person while auto-tune does not. Correction:Steroids have the potential to harm a person while Auto-Tune has the potential to harm millions of people across the world.
Your Welcome
Sincerely, The Guest That Knows Best
P.S. Have you listened to some of that auto-tuned crap (not going to mention any names,*Cough*Rebecca Black*Cough*)? It makes you want to jump a bridge, or it can make you want to rip your ears Off, or just go and become a cutter.
